name: Red
background: Lives with her mother near the edge of the woods; tasked with delivering a letter and treats to her ailing grandmother
motivation: Prove her independence and capability; protect her family; seek truth and understanding in her encounters

name: Wolf
background: A lone wolf known for cleverness; seeks connection but struggles with honest expression
motivation: Win Red’s affection by orchestrating a memorable meeting; later, earn forgiveness and trust

name: Grandmother
background: Lives alone in a cottage in the woods; often ill but mentally sharp
motivation: Protect and guide Red; teach lessons about caution and forgiveness

name: Red’s Mother
background: Single parent, entrusted with Red’s upbringing and safety
motivation: Keep Red safe; instill wisdom and responsibility

name: Hunter
background: Local woodsman or ranger, possibly known for dealing with predators
motivation: Maintain order and safety in the woods; intervene when danger is sensed
